ComicInfo.Summary: Sara and the Magdalena try to protect Jake and Mandy from a stone demon conjured by young Jacob Kaplan. Sara and Jake go to Jacob's house and search his room only to find he is involved in some heavy occult stuff. Magdalena discovers the lair of the Solites and is attacked.
ComicInfo.Tags: Witchblade,Sara Pezzini,Magdalena,Julie Pezzini,New York City,Jake McCarthy,New York State
